div.div: Search functionality allows users to search for terms through the available collections.

ul.li: Different types of search are available. Every user can use any of the available types
The search terms are applied on the selected collections
The user can perform a simple search by providing the search terms or an advanced search by providing also the fields
A browse functionality is also provided for the selected collections
Previous submitted searches of the current session can be refined using the Refine Search Panel
